allCards.description: Attach to target friendly ally. That ally has +1 attack. While that ally has claw attack, it has an additional +1 attack and Relentless Savagery is returned to its owner's hand when that ally is killed.

allCards.name: Tar-written Scroll
allCards.description: 1D: Target ally in a graveyard is exiled: if the exiled ally has fire attack, target opposing ally takes 2 fire damage.

allCards.name: Thriss Crucible
allCards.description: When Thriss Crucible is targeted and destroyed, it is returned to play as a readied Ravager ally with 2 base attack and 5 health and then takes 1 damage.

allCards.name: Gruesome Brutality
allCards.description: Attach to target friendly Shadow ally. When that ally enters combat with an opposing ally, all opposing heroes take 1 damage (or 2 damage if attached to an ally with cost 5 or greater).

allCards.name: Burning Hatred
allCards.description: Attach to target ally. That ally has +2 attack. When Burning Hatred is summoned, that ally takes 1 fire damage.

allCards.name: Surging Darkness
allCards.description: Target friendly hero gains +1 shadow energy for each Shadow ally you control. Draw a card for each location you control.

allCards.name: Groundshift
allCards.description: Duration 1. When Groundshift is summoned, the active location is exiled. Heroes and allies lose all passive abilities.

allCards.name: Spontaneous Growth
allCards.description: Attach to target friendly Homunculus ally. That ally has +1 attack, +1 health and steadfast. When Spontaneous Growth is summoned, draw a card.

allCards.name: Sinkhole
allCards.description: Target opposing ally with cost 2 or less is exiled, or target opposing ally with cost 3 or greater takes 2 damage. If you control no locations, the active location is placed on the bottom of its owner's deck.

allCards.name: Rest for the Weary
allCards.description: If there is a location in play, target ally is moved to the top of its owner's deck. If there are no locations in play, you draw 2 cards and each other player draws 1 card.

allCards.name: Clockwork Soldier
allCards.description: While Clockwork Soldier is an ally, it is returned to play as an artifact when killed. 1SE: If Clockwork Soldier is an artifact, it becomes an Aldmor ally with 3 base attack and 3 health.

allCards.name: Disruptor Field
allCards.description: Friendly Aldmor allies have ambush. 1SE: Target opposing ally has a maximum attack of 0 until the start of your next turn.

allCards.name: Rejuvenation Pod
allCards.description: Friendly Aldmor allies have +1 health. 0SE: Target Aldmor ally in your graveyard is shuffled into your deck.

allCards.name: Shadow Cannon
allCards.description: When Shadow Cannon is summoned while you control an Aldmor ally, your hero gains +2 shadow energy. 4SE: Target hero or ally takes 4 damage.

allCards.name: Aldmor Conflux
allCards.description: 2SE: Friendly Aldmor allies have +X attack until the end of the turn, where X is the number of artifacts you control.

allCards.name: Stun Turret
allCards.description: 0SE: Target opposing ally loses all passive abilities until the end of the turn and takes 1 electrical damage. Stun Turret loses 1 durability at the end of the turn.

allCards.name: Distortion Harness
allCards.description: 1SE: Seek a location. The active location is shuffled into its owner's deck and Distortion Harness loses 1 durability.

allCards.name: Amethyst Reverie
allCards.description: 2SE: Renew 3 used resources.

allCards.name: Pathfinder's Machete
allCards.description: When Pathfinder's Machete is summoned while you control a location, it gains +1 base attack and +1 durability. While you control a location, opposing heroes and allies lose stealth and hidden.

allCards.name: Shard of Ithrund
allCards.description: While you control at least 2 Aldmor allies, your hero gains +1 shadow energy at the end of each of your turns. 1SE: Shard of Ithrund gains +1 durability.

allCards.name: Voidhammer
allCards.description: When your hero attacks, the active location is exiled. When a location is exiled, Voidhammer gains +1 base attack and +1 durability.

allCards.name: Lorhon: Twilight Encampment
allCards.description: 0SE: Target friendly Twilight ally is killed: Seek a Twilight ally and your hero loses 1 shadow energy. // 0SE: If an opposing Twilight ally was killed this turn, all friendly allies gain +1 health.

allCards.name: Sosilo: Brothers' Landing
allCards.description: When an ability or location is discarded from your hand, draw a card. 0SE: Target ability or location in your hand is discarded. // 0SE: Target card in your hand is discarded: Draw a card.

allCards.name: Anmor: Garina Road
allCards.description: Allies with cost 4 or greater cost you 1 less resource to summon. 2SE: If you control no allies, seek an ally with cost 4 or greater. // Allies with cost 4 or greater cost you 1 less resource to summon. 0SE: If there are no opposing allies, take control of this location.

allCards.name: Irum: Lightning Quarry
allCards.description: When electrical damage is dealt to an ally on your turn, renew 3 resources (max twice per turn). // 2SE: All allies take 2 damage. Shuffle this location into its owner's deck.

allCards.name: Gaderi: Braxno Citadel
allCards.description: Your hero and allies you control have defender. Opposing players can't summon locations. // 1SE: This location is exiled at the end of your turn.

allCards.name: The Wilds: Trading Port
allCards.description: 0SE: If an artifact with cost 4 or greater entered or left play this turn, renew 2 used resources and draw a card. // 4SE: Target artifact is destroyed. Take control of this location.

allCards.name: Racksul: Warped Desert
allCards.description: 0SE: The next card owned by an opposing player to be exiled this turn is placed in your hand. // 1SE: Draw a card from each opposing player's deck. Take control of this location.

allCards.name: Arthyle's Pass: Dead Man's Breach
allCards.description: Allies have meek the turn they are summoned. Friendly allies with cost 2 or less have haste and ambush. // When an opposing ally with cost 2 or less is killed, that ally is exiled and its controller takes 1 damage.

allCards.name: Yahari: Valley of Doom
allCards.description: 4SE: All allies with cost 3 or less are exiled. // 2SE: Draw 2 cards and take control of this location.

allCards.name: Lyth: Kristan's Ridge
allCards.description: 3SE: Up to X target heroes or allies take 3 ice damage, where X is the number of friendly ice attack allies. // 3SE: Target opposing hero or ally takes 3 ice damage. Take control of this location.

allCards.name: Ravenscrest: Valley of Secrets
allCards.description: When you summon a support ability, draw a card and renew 1 used resource. // 2SE: Seek an ability.

allCards.name: Shold: Tempest Gorge
allCards.description: When an item or attachment is destroyed, it is exiled. 2SE: Target friendly ally is returned to your hand. // Artifacts you control have Sustain: 1cc. 0SE: Target artifact you control is destroyed.

allCards.name: Oldros: Infested Swampland
allCards.description: 1SE: Until the end of the turn, Wild allies cost you 1 less resource to summon. // When you end your turn while you control no allies, your hero takes 2 poison damage and you draw a card.

allCards.name: Tisay: Volcanic Springs
allCards.description: 1SE: Target ally has all negative effects removed and is set ablaze. // 2SE: Target ally has all negative effects removed, takes 1 fire damage and is set ablaze.

allCards.name: Kiruth: Thaddeus' Vault
allCards.description: 0SE: If an Undead ally has been removed from your graveyard this turn, renew 3 resources. // 2SE: Target ally in a graveyard containing at least 3 cards is placed in your hand.

allCards.name: Asyn: Mount Kazarr
allCards.description: 0SE: Target friendly damaged Ravager ally attacks the opposing ally with the lowest health if able. // 2SE: Target friendly ally attacks the opposing ally with the highest health if able.

allCards.name: Lakmire: Training Outpost
allCards.description: 0SE: If every ally you control has Wulven alignment, the next attachment you summon costs 3 less resources. // 1SE: Target opposing Wulven ally has -2 attack and loses all passive abilities until the start of your next turn.

allCards.name: Rankett: Proving Grounds
allCards.description: 1SE: If an ally gained base attack or health this turn, draw a card and all Homunculus allies gain +1 base attack and +1 health. // 2SE: Draw a card and all Homunculus allies are reduced by 1 health. Take control of this location.

allCards.name: Layarian Knight
allCards.description: All combat damage to Layarian Knight from allies with sword or claw attack is reduced by 1. All ability damage to Layarian Knight is increased by 1.

allCards.name: Layarian Sentinel
allCards.description: Defender (When this ally is attacked, the attacker takes combat damage first.) Layarian Sentinel does -2 combat damage while attacking.

allCards.name: Phaedon Barbarian
allCards.description: When your hero kills an ally in combat while you control a weapon with sword or claw attack, Phaedon Barbarian is readied.

allCards.name: Phaedon Commander
allCards.description: When Phaedon Commander is summoned, target other friendly Shadow ally has all negative effects removed, takes 1 damage and gains +1 base attack.

allCards.name: Wild Boar
allCards.description: Wild Boar has +1 attack while attacking allies.

allCards.name: Black Adder
allCards.description: When Black Adder attacks an ally, that ally is poisoned (it takes 1 poison damage at the start of each of its controller's turns).

allCards.name: Red-Eyed Worg
allCards.description: 1: Red-Eyed Worg attacks target opposing damaged ally if able.

allCards.name: Treetop Spider
allCards.description: Ambush. (Attacks by this ally can't be defended.)

allCards.name: Forest Serpent
allCards.description: Ambush. (Attacks by this ally can't be defended.)

allCards.name: Darkwood Panther
allCards.description: While Darkwood Panther is undamaged, it has stealth. (This ally can't be attacked if it has no damage to be healed.)

allCards.name: Cave Spider
allCards.description: Stealth. (This ally can't be attacked.)

allCards.name: Mountain Wolf
allCards.description: Mountain Wolf has +1 attack for each other friendly Wild ally.

allCards.name: Great Bear
allCards.description: Great Bear has +2 attack while attacking allies with cost 4 or less.

allCards.name: Caravan Smuggler
allCards.description: When Caravan Smuggler is killed, the active player gains 1 resource.

allCards.name: Eastroad Bandit
allCards.description: Meek (this ally can't attack heroes). When Eastroad Bandit kills an ally, you gain 1 resource.

allCards.name: Winthill Assailer
allCards.description: 2: Target ally with cost 3 or less is killed.

allCards.name: Masked Bandit
allCards.description: Masked Bandit has +1 attack while attacking. When your turn ends while Masked Bandit is damaged, he is shuffled into his owner's deck.

allCards.name: Pillaging Arsonist
allCards.description: At the end of each of your turns, all allies without Outlaw alignment take 1 fire damage.

allCards.name: Brigand Captain
allCards.description: Other friendly Outlaw allies have +1 attack.

allCards.name: Darklight Timelord
allCards.description: Haste. 2SE: Target card in a graveyard is placed on top of its owner's resource pile: the bottom card of that resource pile is placed in your hand.

allCards.name: Winged Redeemer
allCards.description: When Winged Redeemer is summoned, target enemy support ability is exiled (removed from the game). When Winged Redeemer enters play, draw a card if your hand is empty.

allCards.name: Resolute Hornbeam
allCards.description: Steadfast (this ally can't leave play unless it is killed). At the end of each of your turns, draw a card if your hand is empty.

allCards.name: Poisoned Well
allCards.description: At the start of your turn, take 1 poison damage for each item you control and Poisoned Well is destroyed. 2: Target player takes control of Poisoned Well and takes 1 poison damage.

allCards.name: Higher Ground
allCards.description: Duration 3. Friendly allies with defender have +1 attack. 2: Target opposing ally attacks target friendly ally if able.

allCards.name: By The Sword
allCards.description: Duration 3. Friendly allies with sword attack gain +1 base attack and +1 health at the end of the turn they were summoned.

allCards.name: Kion the Magnificent
allCards.description: Steadfast. Opposing heroes and allies lose stealth and hidden on the turn Kion enters play. All damage to friendly allies is reduced by 1.

allCards.name: Vull the Insatiable
allCards.description: Steadfast. Opposing heroes and allies lose stealth and hidden on the turn Vull enters play. All damage to opposing allies is increased by 1.

allCards.name: Dark Riding Hood
allCards.description: Other Wulven and Wild allies have +1 attack. When Dark Riding Hood deals combat damage, draw a card from each opposing player's deck.
